Description: UI Extensions to the MvcContrib Project - Themed Grid & Menu

MvcContrib UI Extensions - Themed Grid & Menu

 UI Extensions to the MvcContrib Project - Themed Grid & Menu

The project contains UI extensions to the MvcContrib project - specifically, a jQuery themed and ajaxified grid and a menu helper.

You can view the posts on my blog:

  • Themed & Ajaxified MVCContrib Grid - with page size dropdown
  • MvcContrib Menu

You can also view the demo project here, which contains inline code views.

There is also a NuGet package available via the NuGet package management system - MvcContrib.Shp is the package name.
